expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_evalDocsStartAuditProcess_Parameters
expression_rules.description: Populates the parameters for start audit of AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument audit

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!externalAction: if(
    ri!isDeleteDocument,
    cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
    cons!AS_GAM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UPLOAD
  ),
  rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters(
    newObjects: ri!evaluationDocuments,
    originalObjects: ri!originalEvalDocuments,
    objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument',
    objectDse: if(
      ri!writeObject = false,
      null,
      cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION_DOCUMENT
    ),
    auditDse: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_A_R_EVALUATION,
    auditConfig: rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_Evaluation(),
    username: ri!initiator,
    auditType: cons!AS_GAM_ADT_TXT_AUDIT_TYPE_MANIPULATION,
    externalAction: local!externalAction,
    complexFieldName: "documentChanges",
    manipulationAudit: rule!AS_GSS_BL_constructFieldChangesForEvalDocs(
      evaluationDocuments: ri!evaluationDocuments,
      factorDocMapping: ri!factorDocMapping,
      externalAction: local!externalAction,
      originalEvalDocs: ri!originalEvalDocuments,
      originalFactorDocMapping: ri!originalFactorDocMapping
    )
  ).auditParams
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!externalAction: if(
    ri!isDeleteDocument,
    cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
    cons!AS_GAM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UPLOAD
  ),
  rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters(
    newObjects: ri!evaluationDocuments,
    originalObjects: ri!originalEvalDocuments,
    objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument',
    objectDse: if(
      ri!writeObject = false,
      null,

    ),
    auditDse: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_A_R_EVALUATION,
    auditConfig: rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_Evaluation(),
    username: ri!initiator,
    auditType: cons!AS_GAM_ADT_TXT_AUDIT_TYPE_MANIPULATION,
    externalAction: local!externalAction,
    complexFieldName: "documentChanges",
    manipulationAudit: rule!AS_GSS_BL_constructFieldChangesForEvalDocs(

      externalAction: local!externalAction,

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BL_defaultDataForLPTAEvaluations
expression_rules.description: The default data configuration for LPTA evaluations

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!acceptanceRating: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getRefRatings(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    ratingId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RATING_TYPE_ACCEPTANCE_RATING
  ),
  recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isOnSpotConsensus: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isSignaturesRequired: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isEvaluatorMasked: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.team: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD(
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.teamName: "LPTA Evaluators",
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.teamDescription: "The team rigorously assesses proposals for strict compliance with all minimum technical requirements. They function on a pass/fail basis, certifying only whether an offer is "acceptable." Their goal is to identify all bids that meet the baseline so the lowest price can be selected, without valuing technical superiority.",
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.isDefaultEntry: true()
    ),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.criteria: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD(
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.factorNumber: "LPTA-1",
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaName: "Lowest Price Technically Acceptable",
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaDescription: "Proposals are first evaluated to confirm they meet all minimum technical requirements, without valuing superior performance. Among all technically acceptable offers, the contract is awarded to the one with the lowest evaluated price. Quality beyond the stated minimums is not a distinguishing factor.",
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.Rating: local!acceptanceRating,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaStatusId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isDefaultEntry: true()
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!acceptanceRating: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getRefRatings(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    ratingId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RATING_TYPE_ACCEPTANCE_RATING
  ),
  recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isOnSpotConsensus: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isSignaturesRequired: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isEvaluatorMasked: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.team: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD(
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.teamName: "LPTA Evaluators",
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.teamDescription: "The team rigorously assesses proposals for strict compliance with all minimum technical requirements. They function on a pass/fail basis, certifying only whether an offer is "acceptable." Their goal is to identify all bids that meet the baseline so the lowest price can be selected, without valuing technical superiority.",
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.isDefaultEntry: true()
    ),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.criteria: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD(
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.factorNumber: "LPTA-1",
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaName: "Lowest Price Technically Acceptable",
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaDescription: "Proposals are first evaluated to confirm they meet all minimum technical requirements, without valuing superior performance. Among all technically acceptable offers, the contract is awarded to the one with the lowest evaluated price. Quality beyond the stated minimums is not a distinguishing factor.",

      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaStatusId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_convertPhaseRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit
expression_rules.description: The rule is used to convert phase record data to normal data for audit purposes

data.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationPhaseId]
  ),
  {},
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
    value: a!map(
      evaluationPhaseId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationPhaseId],
      evaluation: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
        )
      ),
      refPhase: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          taskCategoryId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.refPhaseId],
          categoryName: index(
            rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTaskCategories(
              returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
              taskCategoryId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.refPhaseId]
            ),
            "categoryName",
            null
          )
        )
      ),
      duration: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.duration],
      durationUnit: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.durationUnit]

      ),
      startDate: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.startDate],
      endDate: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.endDate],
      isActive: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],

      modifiedDatetime: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]

  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

data.sail_code:
/*Revisit all the field mappings when it is changed from CDT to Records*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
  ),
  {},
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
    value: a!map(
      vendorId: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
      vendorRefId: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId],
      evaluation: rule!AS_GSS_UT_convertEvaluationRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit(
        evaluation: ri!evaluation
      ),
      submittedDate: rule!AS_GSS_UT_convertDateTimeFromOrToGMT(
        value: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.submittedDate],
        toGmt: true()
      ),
      legalName: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
      businessName: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName],
      vendorAddressLine1: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
      vendorAddressLine2: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
      vendorCity: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
      vendorState: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState],
      vendorCountry: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry],
      vendorZipCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
      vendorZipCodeExt: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
      vendorForeignPostalCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
      duns: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns],
      cageCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode],
      uniqueEntityId: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId],
      status: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
      expirationDate: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
      sourceApplication: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId],
      isActive: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
      totalPrice: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalPrice],
      pricingNotes: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.pricingNotes],
      priceBreakup: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.priceBreakup],
        expression: a!map(
          itemId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemId],
          evalVendorId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.evalVendorId],
          itemDescription: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemDescription],
          unitPrice: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.unitPrice],

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
expression_rules.description: Captures metadata of a CDT if it or any of its children were updated, doing the same for all of its complex MULTIPLE children recursively.  Ideally, we should update this to work for all children.

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)
